txt.en: 'The spider you defeated with Atli, Aegarach, was a daughter of Iphantemel herself. If one is here, her sisters will be as well. They are known to me: Lhothbad, I치rvereth, Saeriel. Terrible all. I speculate that they are the reason that some of the Mirkwood spiders have separated themselves from the rest. Perhaps they are attempting to retain control of their brood. Regardless, these sisters must be hunted down. They are responsible for the deaths of many of my people.'
The Daughters of Iphantemel are lurking somewhere in Taurlingol.\n\nYou should defeat Lhothbad, I치rvereth, and Saeriel.
Legolas can be found on a hill near Taurlingol.\n\nYou should talk to Legolas.
'You have given my people a great gift with the deaths of these horrible monsters. Their deaths have been avenged.'
Iphantemel's own daughters hide in Taurlingol, attempting the retain control of the Mirkwood spiders.
